channel.title: Getting specials to hit

item.title: Getting specials to hit
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

i just figured out how to make a spec for a certain weapon. i made it exactally like the others except for a couple of diffrences

what i enterd

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount >= 50) { ProjectileSpec(77, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = true; specialDamage = 25; specialDamage2 = 25; }

other specs:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (weapon id) && specialAmount >= #) { ProjectileSpec(77, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }

how do i make it so that when i do the spec it does damage? this spec is for d claws (13664)
gfx id = 77 (claws of guthix)

BTW IF YU HAVE THE ACUAL GFX ID FOR THE REAL D CLAWS SPEC I WOULD GREATLY APPRECIATE IT IF YU WOULD TELL ME (:

any help is appreciated (:

Read full topic
